# 18 - MagicNumber


PUSH1 0x2a ;;42 in dec
PUSH1 0
MSTORE
PUSH1 32
PUSH1 0
RETURN

0x602a60005260206000f3

PUSH1 0x0a
PUSH1 --
PUSH1 0x00
CODECOPY

PUSH1 0x0a
PUSH1 0x00
RETURN

0x600a600c600039600a6000f3

0x600a600c600039600a6000f3 + 0x602a60005260206000f3 = 0x600a600c600039600a6000f3602a60005260206000f3
